5.text:
Hello, I'm Mary McCartney and as hopefully
summer is around the corner, I am here to

9.text:
show you how to make some really delicious
black bean burgers. Now, these are ready for

14.text:
the BBQ or the frying pan in four easy steps.
First, we fry. Heat your oil, add the chopped

21.text:
onions, and allow that to cook for about
three minutes. Now add the mushrooms, stir

28.text:
in the soy sauce, and let that simmer about
two to three minutes more. Now you add the

34.text:
garlic, chopped spring onions, herbs, and
the slightly mashed up black beans. And allow

41.text:
that to cook for a couple more minutes. Next
we have taken the mixture from the frying

45.text:
pan and put it into a bowl so it can cool
slightly. And now we're going to add four

50.text:
tablespoons of flour, a teaspoon of marmite,
and a pinch of black pepper to taste. So now

56.text:
it's time to roll up your sleeves - mixing
it so that it's really well combined. If I'm

62.text:
doing them straight for the pan then I just
shape them and put them into the pan. Fry

68.text:
them for a couple of minutes on each side,
you want them to be nice and brown and have

72.text:
the chance to cook through. And I think these
are done, so time to put them into the buns.

78.text:
There you have it, delicious black bean burgers.
I hope you enjoy them.
